question: The initial increase of magnetic field in magnetic storms is caused
option1: when the shock wave, associated with the gusty solar wind, compresses the magnetosphere
option2: when there is a large decrease in field intensity
option3: when the gust wind itself engulfs the magnetosphere
answer: when the shock wave, associated with the gusty solar wind, compresses the magnetosphere
